/****** Object:  Table [dbo].[DimOrderReview]    Script Date: 12/28/2021******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[DimOrderReview]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[DimOrderReview]
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimOrderReview](
	[sk_review] [int] IDENTITY(1,1),
	[review_id] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[order_id] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[review_score] [tinyint] NULL,
	[review_creation_date] [datetime2](7) NULL,
	[review_sentiment] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[review_answer_timestamp] [datetime2](7) NULL,
	[scd_created_at] [datetime2](7) DEFAULT GETDATE(),
	[scd_is_current] [nvarchar](50) DEFAULT 'YES',
 CONSTRAINT [PK_DimOrderReview] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[sk_review] ASC
)WITH (STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
